  1. """Models for the ``contact_form`` app."""
  2. from django.db import models
  3. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  5. from django_libs.models_mixins import SimpleTranslationMixin
  8. class ContactFormCategory(SimpleTranslationMixin, models.Model):
  9. """
  10. The category of the users contact request.
  12. Is created as translatable master data by the admin.
  13. For translatable fields check the ``ContactFormCategoryTranslation`` model.
  15. """
  16. slug = models.SlugField(
  17. max_length=256,
  18. verbose_name=_('Slug'),
  19. )
  21. def __unicode__(self):
  22. return self.get_translation().name
  24. @property
  25. def name(self):
  26. return self.get_translation().name
  29. class ContactFormCategoryTranslation(models.Model):
  30. """Translatable fields of the ``ContactFormCategory`` model."""
  31. name = models.CharField(
  32. max_length=256,
  33. verbose_name=_('Name'),
  34. )
  36. # needed by simple-translation
  37. contact_form_category = models.ForeignKey(ContactFormCategory)
  38. language = models.CharField(max_length=16)
  40. def __unicode__(self):
  41. return '{0} ({1})'.format(self.name, self.language)
